## Data loading and getting the feeling of the dataset

```{r}
students <- readxl::read_excel("student_data.xlsx")

# 370 rows, 39 columns
dim(students)

# Show column names
names(students)
```
```{r}
# Show first few rows
head(students)
```


```{r}
# Show details for each column
summary(students)
```
```{r}
# Check the class of the column. "numeric", "character"...
sapply(students,class)
```

```{r}
# Filter valeus
students <- students %>% filter_all(all_vars(!is.na(.) & !is.nan(.) & !is.null(.)))

```
